other_tests.findings: abnormal spontaneous activity suggestive of ongoing muscle injury in the left deltoid and left vastus lateralis muscles
other_tests.changes_over_time: Repeat electromyography of the arms revealed persistent myopathy in the proximal muscles and new myopathy in the distal muscles.

other_tests.findings: active inflammatory myopathy, electron microscopy revealed tubuloreticular inclusions in endothelial cells
mild oropharyngeal dysphagia and no evidence of aspiration
other_tests.changes_over_time: On hospital day 8, repeat study showed moderate oropharyngeal dysphagia and intermittent trace aspiration.

other_tests.findings: CMV DNA viral load of 1,280,000 IU per milliliter
homogeneous green staining of nuclei indicating the presence of CMV
